name: Push&Pull
description:
You can push Green Blocks. And You can pull Blue Blocks. You can push or pull Yellow Blocks.

Once you move blocks, they become Gray Blocks which You can't move.

There are Holes which you can't pass, but if you fall blocks into holes, they become Floors which you can pass.

If you touch the Door, you clear the stage.

There are 16 stages. Can you clear all stages?
